title: EMUAID® First Defense Probiotic 30 Caps
description: First Defense Probiotic Supplement helps restore the natural balance of good bacteria in the digestive tract to support a healthy immune system.
cleaned_text: We've updated and improved our prized daily probiotic supplement as new research has shown the powerful antioxidant and digestive benefits of Lactobacillus Plantarum. As the scientific community continues to investigate the various health benefits of probiotic microorganisms, new studies have emerged to show the efficacy and versatility of certain probiotic strains. Our supercharged daily supplement now contains 40 billion CFUs of the unique blend of Lactobacillus acidophilus, Lactobacillus plantarum and Streptococcus thermophilus to better promote healthy digestion, prevent gas and bloating, reduce inflammation and maintain regularity.
